bibl.title: City of the Dead. Tuna el-Gebel.
bibl.note: The history of excavations and exploration at Tuna el-Gebel. - The site. - The necropolis of Tuna el-Gebel before Roman rule. - The development of the urban structure in the early Roman period. - The tombs of the second and third centuries C.E. - The development of decoration from Ptolemaic to Roman times. - Burial ceremonies and visitors at the tomb. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: The Oxford Handbook of Roman Egypt.

bibl.seg: Lembke Katja, City of the Dead. Tuna el-Gebel.
Christina Riggs (Ed.), The Oxford Handbook of Roman Egypt (Oxford, 2012) pp. 205-222, 9 figg.

The history of excavations and exploration at Tuna el-Gebel. - The site. - The necropolis of Tuna el-Gebel before Roman rule. - The development of the urban structure in the early Roman period. - The tombs of the second and third centuries C.E. - The development of decoration from Ptolemaic to Roman times. - Burial ceremonies and visitors at the tomb. - Conclusion.
